content: @Ward Weistra can verify if this is still an issue: FHIR-33132 Wrong link to IG homepage from package manifest?
IF it is still is an issue, can I fix or is this a job for @Lynn Laakso or @Grahame Grieve
There's nothing for firely to do with this one - the package is wrong. And the only way to issue a new package is a technical correction
otoh, I can fix the web site up. I'll upload a fix along with the search form fixes, and we'll see if that fixes it
